name: UITransitionContextViewControllerKey
desc: The keys you use to identify the view controllers involved in a transition.

items.name: static let from: UITransitionContextViewControllerKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the view controller that is visible at the beginning of the transition, or at the end of a canceled transition.

items.name: static let to: UITransitionContextViewControllerKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the view controller that is visible at the end of a completed transition.
